name: Miro (jinwho)
description:
Key Bindings

* wasd to move

* LMB to attack

* RMB to bow

* E to grappling Hook

* z to spawn bomb

* c to spawn box

* shift to sliding

Assets used in game

--- Arts ---

Enviroment from : https://kauzz.itch.io/kpf and https://kauzz.itch.io/pixel-valley-plataform-tiles

Player from : https://rvros.itch.io/animated-pixel-hero

Slime from : https://rvros.itch.io/pixel-art-animated-slime

Bomb from : https://opengameart.org/content/16-bit-animated-bomb

Bomb Explosion from : https://opengameart.org/content/pixel-explosion-12-frames

Arrow from : https://thatgamesguy.co.uk/cpp-game-dev-32/

Health Bar From : 

Hook from : https://opengameart.org/content/re-worked-arrow-spear-head

--- Musics ---

Theme Music from : https://opengameart.org/content/caketown-cuteplayful

Bomb Explosion Sound from : https://opengameart.org/content/bombexplosion8bit

Slime Hit, Die sound from : https://opengameart.org/content/8-wet-squish-slurp-impacts

Sword Sound from : https://opengameart.org/content/punches-hits-swords-and-squishes

Sliding Sound from : https://opengameart.org/content/air-woosh-move

Bow firing sound from : https://opengameart.org/content/4-projectile-launches

Player Hurt, Jump, Die sound from : https://opengameart.org/content/playersounds-1-by-emopreben
